name: kr.iamport.cordova.example
description: A sample Apache Cordova application that responds to the deviceready event.

scripts.sync: npm run sync-ios && npm run sync-android
scripts.sync-ios: npm run uninstall-ios && npm run install-ios
scripts.sync-android: npm run uninstall-android && npm run install-android
scripts.install-ios: cordova platform add ios && plugman install --platform ios --project platforms/ios --plugin ../../IamportCordova --link
scripts.install-android: cordova platform add android && plugman install --platform android --project platforms/android --plugin ../../IamportCordova --link
scripts.uninstall-ios: plugman uninstall --platform ios --project platforms/ios --plugin ../../IamportCordova --link && rm -rf platforms
scripts.uninstall-android: plugman uninstall --platform android --project platforms/android --plugin ../../IamportCordova --link && rm -rf platforms

author: Apache Cordova Team
